description: General OPD – Consultation for common health issues like fever, cold, headache, and seasonal illnesses. Our expert physicians provide personalized advice and treatment plans to ensure optimal health.
Specialized health care for infants, children, and adolescents. We focus on preventive care, vaccinations, and managing both common and complex childhood illnesses.
Treatment for ear pain, hearing issues, sinus problems, and throat infections. Our ENT specialists provide comprehensive care including diagnosis, medical treatment, and minor procedures.
Care for bone fractures, joint pain, and musculoskeletal injuries. We provide both surgical and non-surgical solutions to restore mobility and reduce pain effectively.
High-resolution CT scan, X-ray, and imaging services. Our radiology department ensures accurate diagnosis using advanced imaging technology and expert analysis.
Full-service pathology lab for blood tests, biopsies, and other diagnostic investigations. We deliver precise and timely results to support effective treatment plans.
Heart‑related diagnosis and treatment including ECG, stress tests, and cardiology consultations. Our cardiologists focus on preventive care and advanced interventions for heart health.
Pregnancy care, menstrual issues, and overall women’s health. Our gynecologists provide personalized guidance, prenatal support, and treatment for reproductive health conditions.
Teeth cleaning, tooth extraction, and preventive dental treatments. Our dental specialists ensure oral health with pain-free procedures and professional care.
24/7 emergency services for accidents, injuries, and sudden illnesses. Our trauma team provides rapid response and comprehensive care to stabilize and treat patients effectively.
